objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Classic Retro-Styled Design
• Advanced Manual Control Dials
• Compact & Lightweight Body

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Professional Mirrorless Camera | Classic Design Meets Modern Innovation
product_details.description:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor for exceptional image quality
• Classic retro-styled design with premium build quality
• Advanced manual control dials for precise shooting settings
• Compact and lightweight mirrorless body ideal for travel
• High-resolution electronic viewfinder (EVF)
• Tiltable LCD screen for creative composition
• Fast autofocus system with multiple focus points
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Compatible with Fujifilm's X-mount lens system
• Film simulation modes for creative photography
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Ergonomic grip for comfortable handling
• Multiple customizable function buttons
• Weather-sealed construction for durability

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and bold layout to advertise a mirrorless camera. It is divided into four quadrants with a clear product image ("product_image") prominently placed on the right half to capture visual attention. The left half includes layered, high-contrast text elements such as the main product brand ("heading"), the model name ("subheading"), and its category ("product_category"). Below that, a statement tagline ("tagline") connects heritage with contemporary style. A feature list ("description") in bullet points elaborates the technical highlights. The bottom section showcases the price point ("price") and a call-to-action button ("cta" and "cta_background"). Circular graphic accents and tech-inspired details enhance the modern, digital aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Navy: #0A1E2E  
- Slate Blue: #1D2B38  
- Deep Steel: #121E28  
- Gold Ochre: #D9A846  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera with a sleek, professional appearance dominated by deep, matte black (#1C1C1C) as the primary color, giving it a modern and high-tech feel. Accents of metallic silver (#D8D8D8) on the dial markings and lens details create a clear, crisp contrast. Subtle highlights in white (#FFFFFF) are used for branding and scale numbers, enhancing visibility. Minor elements like the red "5.6" text (#FF4C4C) and orange lens marker (#FFA500) add visual interest without overwhelming the design. For an advertisement banner, using a monochromatic black palette with pops of red and orange can emphasize sophistication and precision.
